clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Ropivacaine (With Epinephrine) in BABA Endoscopic and Robotic Thyroidectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 3 Study of Ropivacaine (With Epinephrine) in BABA Endoscopic and Robotic Thyroidectomy

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the pain relief and the hemodynamic stability of ropivacaine with epinephrine in BABA endoscopic and robotic thyroidectomy.

detailed_description.textblock: Diluted ropivacaine with epinephrine is injected into the subcutaneous space to relieve pain and reduce bleeding during procedures. The synergistic effect of ropivacaine with epinephrine can contribute to patients' welfare, such as relieving pain and structuring the hemodynamic stability.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Change of VAS pain scores for the first 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: The visual analogue scale is utilized to assess the postoperative pain change for the first 12 hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum of measured systolic blood pressures
secondary_outcome.description: The maximal systolic blood pressure is monitored during surgery.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum of measured diastolic blood pressures
secondary_outcome.description: The maximal diastolic blood pressure is monitored during surgery.
The maximal heart rate is monitored during surgery.
The blood loss amount is estimated at the end of surgery.

arm_group.description: 200cc normal saline is injected into the subcutaneous layer for the initial flap dissection.

1 mg/mL 1cc epinephrine is diluted in 200cc normal saline and then 7.5 mg/mL 30cc ropivacaine is diluted in the same normal saline. The mixture is injected into the subcutaneous layer for the initial flap dissection.

intervention.description: According to the Ministry of Health and Welfare, ropivacaine is classified as no. 121- local analgesic and epinephrine as no. 245- adrenal hormone drug.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of thyroid neoplasm or benign goiter
- Scheduled for BABA endoscopic or robotic thyroidectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Completion thyroidectomy
- Modified radical neck dissection
- Allergy history
- Stroke history
- Uncontrolled hypertension
- Uncontrolled diabetes
- Coagulopathy
- Severe cardiovascular disease
- Severe pulmonary disease
- Chronic kidney disease
- Pregnant
